mapper.select: select m.member_number as 'memberNo', m.member_point as 'memberPoint', sum(op.order_product_amount * op.order_product_price - op.order_product_coupon_amount) as 'totalPrice' from member as m inner join `bookpub_order` as o on o.member_number = m.member_number inner join order_and_product as op on op.order_number = o.order_number inner join order_product_state_code as opsc on opsc.order_product_state_code_number = op.order_product_code_number where o.created_at between LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) and LAST_DAY(NOW()) and opsc.order_product_state_code_name = '구매확정' group by m.member_number LIMIT #{_skiprows}, #{_pagesize}
